infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses the location to find the Person near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location to find the Person near you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses Photo Library for uploading your profile picture.
